name: Extreme Jeep Racing 3D 2017
description:
Are you willing to take part in new trend of racing battle? The challenge for driving experts is ready….So join Super Jeep Racing 3D 2017,it is an unseen rally contest.
This is a real 2017th competitive racing simulator over monster track of city road that invites everyone to play driving feats. Different elements of 3D battle are united to make ground of this spinner’s adventure. The game is possessing rider action scheme and bold stunt show to meet destiny.
Take account of its characteristics….. It offers you four delegating environments and collection of elegant Jeeps. The environment is mixture of dangerous track, city stadium location, exciting audience and its stimulating sound of cheers and clap.
Monster 3D driving Battle is quite easy to play. Rider has to chase the final point by passing through various turns and twists, keep in mind this is not a sole race but it is composed by plenty of rider opponents who run along you to beat you at any step. Beat all other rival spinners to reach at winning point before the access of competitors. The threat of accidents may reduce your courage but curiosity to see what is next forces you to play more and more.
Super road expert challenge 2017 has six laps in every race. The first stage is unlocked and the winning cash is needed to purchase other stages. Variety of Jeep is useful only if you get success in the playing stage. Similarly environments option can be useful when you complete your first mission.

Features
Super racing Battle 2017
New trend of Jeep driving
Excellent jeep rally contest
3D Monster road race
Collection of unique city environments
Lock and unlock able criteria for each aspect
Addictive simulator race
Destiny chase competition
6 fast and furious laps for each race
Faculty to share application
How to Play
Some points to play the game
- Firstly download the application
- Tap to play the mission in a while
- Completion of level will brings different offers for you
- Select the environment that you like
- Play the next lap orderly
- Choose your favorite jeep from vehicle bar
- Share it to other for spare time

For more queries you may contact through email: Soloftech2017@gamil.com
